data.title: Gordon Institute
data.text:
Tech-driven organizations are powered by people.

Thatâ€™s why Tufts Gordon Institute is creating transformative leaders with heart. Leaders who are savvy in both business and technology. Those who are deeply in tune with society, and want to drive high-impact change that will make the world a better place. Innovators with both the practical skillset and creative mindset needed to accelerate their careers and influence the future of businesses.

Tufts Gordon Institute provides knowledge right when you need it, from workshops to full master's degree programs, throughout your professional life. Our interactive programs are designed to build your expertise in leadership, innovation, management, and entrepreneurship - all taught by industry-expert faculty with a focus on helping you to discover your purpose.

Undergraduate Programs

We offer undergraduate courses and minors that help Tufts students get ahead before their career even begins. Choose from minors like Engineering Management, Foundations for Future Leadership, Entrepreneurship, or Entrepreneurship for Social Impact.

Learn more about undergraduate opportunities Arrow

Graduate Programs

We offer immersive graduate programs that develop transformative leaders as students gain relevant skills through hands-on curricula offered online, hybrid, and on-campus. Choose from programs such as the MS in Engineering Management, MS in Technology Management & Leadership, MS in Innovation Management, MSIM Dual Degree Programs, and an Advanced Graduate Certificate in Technology Management & Leadership.

Learn more about graduate programs Arrow

Professional Education

No matter where you are in your career journey, we offer professional development opportunities that will build not only your skills and resume, but also your network as you meet other STEM leaders and industry-expert faculty. Choose from opportunities such as individual courses, workshops or coaching within the Tufts Transformative Leadership Community.

Learn more about Professional Education Arrow

Programs for Companies

We provide corporate education programs grounded in our proven expertise in fostering leadership skills, an innovation mindset, and business acumen among technical professionals. Choose from programs such as corporate training workshops, custom opportunities designed for your company, or the Tufts Transformative Leadership Community.

Learn more about programs for companies Arrow
